name: Extreme Cake Decorator
description:
A 2-4 player, twin-stick shooter where players compete to cover giant cakes with their team's frosting and decorations.

Please Note: This game requires controllers and 2-4 players.

Controls:

Left Stick : Move

Right Stick: Aim+Fire

Left Shoulder Buttons : Jump

Right Shoulder Buttons : Fire

Hold Down + Jump : Drop Down

Action Buttons : Jump or Fire

Credits:

Programming/Art/Design - Joshua Thom

Music/SFX/QA - Jordan Moresi
